vote.title: To Recognize and Celebrate Pat Kearns-Davis for 50 Years in Real Estate in Columbus, Ohio
vote.description: TitleTo Recognize and Celebrate Pat Kearns-Davis for 50 Years in Real Estate in Columbus, OhioBodyWHEREAS, Pat Kearns-Davis has spent 50 years in real estate, becoming a visionary businesswoman who worked tirelessly to make the dream of homeownership a reality for anyone with a true desire to achieve it; andWHEREAS, she has mentored countless other real estate agents locally and abroad to be fully committed to increasing homeownership throughout Columbus and the United States; andWHEREAS, Ms. Kearns-Davis has been an active member of her community for decades, leading events such as the Clintonville Fourth of July Celebration; andWHEREAS, Ms. Kearns-Davis is a devout woman of faith who brings a charitable spirit and community-oriented mindset into everything she does; andWHEREAS, she is committed to self-improvement and professional growth which is evident in her illustrious real estate career; now, therefore,BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council does hereby recognize and celebrate Pat Kearns-Davis' 50 years of service in real estate, and her monumental contributions to the Columbus community as a whole.
